text: Louis Gallois (born 26 January 1944) is the chairman and former CEO of Airbus.Profile: Louis Gallois He graduated from HEC Paris and ENA.Portrait de Louis Gallois, ancien PDG d’EADS He was also CEO of Aérospatiale and SNCF.Louis Gallois, le plus beau CV de l'industrie française, tire sa révérence == References == Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Montauban
title: Louis Gallois
